definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
funds on call/invested sum that can be cashed

sentences.english: The deposit insurance fund fell into the red in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 存款保险资金在2009年进入红色警戒区。

sentences.english: If I have enought money, I will make a journey around the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我有足够的资金，我将完成一次环球旅行。

sentences.english: They will allocate funds to you if you requisition it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你提出书面申请，他们就会拨给你资金。

sentences.english: There were signs of capital outflow.
That is, we have increased the supply of loanable funds.
sentences.chinese: 这将使我们的可借贷资金的供应增加。

sentences.english: An investor-friendly package is paramount to funding.
sentences.chinese: 对投资者有利的方案是极为重要的资金。

sentences.english: The implication was that there was no meaningful shortfall in client funds.
sentences.chinese: 言下之意是客户资金不存在真正意义上的亏空。

sentences.english: Certain amount of project funds can be used to support CCM Secretariat function and member participation.
sentences.chinese: 可使用项目资金支持CCM秘书处工作和成员的参与。

sentences.english: Examples of projects I have helped fund through my Kiva account.
sentences.chinese: 我曾通过我的Kiva账户为这两个项目提供资金。

sentences.english: Return of capital has become more important than return on capital.
sentences.chinese: 回笼资金已变得比资本回报率更重要了。

sentences.english: But there’s a money factor for most transit systems.
sentences.chinese: 但是，大多数公交系统都有资金的问题。

sentences.english: That's going to change the rules about how to raise money.
sentences.chinese: 这将改变如何筹募资金的规则。

sentences.english: Fund shortage restricts the development of col leges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 资金短缺是制约高校发展的主要原因。

sentences.english: We can do it later when we have more money.
sentences.chinese: 等我们有足够的资金再做也不迟。

sentences.english: Provide for appropriate financial and cost analysis related to any proposed capital expenditures or divestitures .
sentences.chinese: 为资金支出或财产剥夺提供正确的财政及成本分析。

sentences.english: Indemnificatory housing difficultly on difficultly in sources of fund.
sentences.chinese: 保障性住房难就难在资金来源。

definition: hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
to dump (selling abroad more cheaply than cost price at home)
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
